physicalTable.name: SAMP_EMPL_D_VH
physicalTable.description: Employee Dimension table: Stores employee dimension attribute information

physicalColumns.name: Hire_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Hire Date: Stores employee hire date information in date format

physicalColumns.name: Type
physicalColumns.description: Type: Stores employee type information as text

physicalColumns.name: Postn_Key
physicalColumns.description: Position Key: Joins to Postn_key in employee position dimension table

physicalColumns.name: Mgr_Id
physicalColumns.description: Manager Id: Stores manager id as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Employee_Key
physicalColumns.description: Employee Key: Surrogate key of the employee dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Empl_Name
physicalColumns.description: Employee Name: Stores employee name as a text
